Update to ESPS/
Installation Instructions
11 August 1993
This document updates the enclosed ESPS/
installation instructions. There are no significant differences in the in
If you are upgrading from a previous version of ESPS/
it is particularly important that you read the enclosed release notes. Also
eversion
Also note that if you are upgrading from ESPS/
4.1/2.1 or 4.2/3.1, then your license key files are the same. You can save y
$ESPS_BASE/lib/keys
directory before you remove the old ESPS and copy those files into the new
directory.
Be sure that you stop the old
is being started in the
file be sure that you update the pathname in there. If you are updating fro
The differences are:
Page 6 (System Requirements):
tThe Sparc release requires Sun OS 4.1.1 or greater or Solaris 2.1 or greate
